about_the_game:
If you are a value hunter this DLC is likely not for you.

BUT if YOU want to support us we have some exclusive things for you as a way to so thanks!

Right now the pack includes:
  • Two Playable Developers (Bauke & Steven)
  • A certificate that officially says you are awesome
  • Our love (not really an item, but you know..)

And our goal is to add more small cosmetics down the line (at no additional cost for people that already own this pack).

If you do decide to get this DLC you are awesome and thanks from the whole Meteor Mug team <3
